mapper.select: select P.postId , C.ctgName , U.userId , A.sido , A.sigungu , A.town , P.title , P.price , P.details , P.image , P.creationDate , P.productStatus from productposttbl P LEFT OUTER JOIN usertbl U ON P.userno = U.userno LEFT OUTER JOIN addresstbl A ON P.addressId = A.addressId LEFT OUTER JOIN ctgtbl C ON P.ctgid = C.ctgid WHERE P.productStatus = 1
